metadata.title: KAYLINE Chemical Service Station in Black Fold-A-Way Service Tray (Model: FT59)
description: Eliminate clutter in your salon. The ProHairTools Kayline Designed FT59 Fold-A-Way Service Tray Model FT59 by AKRA provides an organized, uncluttered work area for all chemical services. Convenient tray for coloring, weaving, perms, hair extensions, and styling. Folds easily for compact storage. Simple tray lock release for tilting tray up into storage position. The Crystal Black 14.5" x 15.5" tray is easy to clean. The sturdy black steel stand puts all your supplies at a handy 35" and rolls anywhere you need it. The service tray's graceful legs and roller feet make it easy to use and easy to move when needed. Features: Clean, uncluttered work area for all chemical services Stain resistant finish tray; easy to clean Sturdy black steel stand rolls anywhere you need it Puts all your supplies at working height Low center of gravity and broad base; virtually untipable Approximate dimensions: 14.5" x 15.5" Top tray, 35" working height and 48" folding height In Black Made in the USA Some assembly is required + Free Double Dip Comb/Brush
